title: Championship bundles not discounting properly?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
The only skins i don't own in the bundles are Championship Zed and Championship Riven. 

Therefore seeming the bundles are 30% and 50% off, it should be cheaper for me to buy the bundle _(That those two skins are included in)_. than to buy the two skins on their own.

Yet somehow the two bundles are the same price _(which shouldn't happen anyway seeming they have different discount rates)_ and are the same price as the un-discounted skins?

Whats going on?

replies.body:
Hey,

Sorry for any confusion but most things in the bundle are discounted except for the Champ zed and riven skins. Hope that helps clear things up.

Hey thanks for the reply.

However I would strongly consider re-wording the information here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift

As it legitimately says _"30% off championship skins"_ and includes Zed and Riven in the list of championship skins, without any additional information stating that they are excluded in the sale _(why they are even included in the bundle if this is the case anyway, makes no sense.)_ And hypothetically if it was a court case, a judge would rule in favour of intentional misleading advertising, as things listed as 30%/50% off, were in fact not 30%/50% off.

It also partially ruins the premise of a discount, as the whole purpose of a discount is to make consumers spend more money than they would usually by buying something other than the item they went to the store for, because they think they are getting a bargain. The shop then makes more money from people buying something extra that they weren't intending to, then they lose by selling a product at a discount.
However the shop also runs the risk that people who went into the shop purely to buy the discounted item, and do not buy any additional items, will benefit more from the discount than the shop will.
Its seems unsporting to reduce any risk to the shop itself.
So saying _"These items are discounted, UNLESS thats the only item you came into the shop to buy."_ is rather an unfriendly move, and hardly inspires trust from the consumer.

It may be selfish of me to say this but:
Seeming that the Esports mega bundle requires you to buy **27** skins just to get a 50% off deal, it think its fair that for people who already own 25 of those 27 skins (and bought them at full price on release) that the 50% off deal would still apply to the whole bundle. 
That seems more than fair to me.

However my whole point is rendered mute by the fact that upon seeing your reply, I have bought the two skins. 

Thanks for clearing it up :)

I don't think Championship Zed skin gets a discount since it is a new skin, like how when a new champion is released now, their release skin bundle makes the champ half price but you still pay the full 1350 or 975 RP for the skin. It is misleading yep, but that's how Riot does their bundles. My only guess as to why the bundles stay the same price is that maybe wards/summoner icons in the bundles if there is any.
